name: Anna Petrova
key_facts: loves detective stories and traveling
fears public speaking
dreams of writing her own book
maintains warm relationships with parents from another city

name: Sergey Ivanov
occupation: sales manager at an IT company
living: sometimes works from home to spend more time with family
key_facts: loves telling jokes and meeting new people
invites friends to dinners, loves trying new food
dreams of winning the city marathon

name: Ella Krotkova
key_facts: grew up in a settlement of scholars called the Quiet Plain
studies the impact of global networks on local cultures
has mapped 120+ medicinal plants
avoids formal ceremonies whenever possible

name: Bars
living: sleeps where the night finds him
key_facts: past shrouded in rumor and half‑truths
ex‑smuggler on southern trade routes
owns a battered pocket chess set
never stays long in one city

name: Crystal
habits: annotates news feeds with ML predictions
living: shares a micro‑loft in a megacity
key_facts: builds unauthorized gadgets since childhood
studies unindexed historical events
dreams of open‑sourcing all government data
gets flustered by loud public quarrels

name: Umberfo
living: resides in a secluded woodland shrine
key_facts: last heir of an ancient forest order
bears ritual scar on the forehead
sells relic knowledge to fund conservation
suspects a coming ecological rift

name: Gooey
living: stored in a temperature‑controlled containment box
key_facts: product of failed bio‑mineral experiment
senses environment via heat and voltage
vulnerable to UV light
researchers debate its legal status
